Posts.Content: I have had 3 CTC test and each have come back 0 so that is good. Can't do them more than every three months as I am doing so well. I am stage 4 Breast Cancer and on the 27th I was told I have no cancer I have been on Xeloda for 5 months and it seems to be the chemo pill I needed to get rid of it.Â
Posts.Title: Circulating Tumor Cells (CTC)
